summary: Une armure lourde de Pendragon moins encombrante que l'originale.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#93c47d][size=4][b]NOTE  :  I give my permission for people to upload this mod.[/b][/size][/color]




[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]

[color=grey][size=4][b]Required Mods :[/b][/size][b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url][/b][size=1] by dimon99[/size][/color]

[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]

[color=grey][size=4][b]Recommanded Mods :[/b][/size][b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22646]Animated Female Idle for Mixed Armor[/url][/b][size=1] by Clepsa[/size][/color]

[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]


[size=2][color=grey] I thought that the heavy armor of Pendragon was too cumbersome for a feminine character, so I decided to reduce it a little. I modified the aspect of the gloves (there are still some problems to be fixed).[/color][/size]

[size=1][color=lightslategray]Je trouvais que l'armure lourde de Pendragon était trop encombrante pour un personnage féminin, je l'ai donc réduite un peu. J'ai modifié l'aspect des gants et rendu les bottes plus fines (Il reste encore quelques problèmes à régler.)[/color][/size]


[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]

[color=grey][size=4][b]Installation :[/b][/size]


Just extrat the[/color] [b][color=Lightslategray]Data Folder[/color][/b] in your [b][color=Lightslategray]Skyrim Folder[/color][/b][color=grey].[/color]

[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]
author: Clepsa
